article_title: Our View: U.S. Rep. Joe Kennedy's big committee assignment

article_metadata.description: U.S. Rep. Joseph Kennedy III, D-Mass., will be elevated considerably in congressional stature in the new year. Kennedy was appointed Wednesday to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce, a powerful panel with purview over a wide range of issues important to our region. As Kennedy said, “It's hard to go half a day without touching something this committee has jurisdiction over.”
article_metadata.author: Editorial Board

og.site_name: The Herald News, Fall River, MA
